name: todoist-mcp
description: Comprehensive Todoist integration for Claude - manage tasks, projects, labels, and more with 19 powerful tools
long_description:
A feature-rich MCP server providing complete Todoist integration for Claude Desktop. This extension enables natural language task management with support for:

- **Task Management**: Create, update, delete, complete, and reopen tasks with full attribute support including priorities, due dates, labels, and time blocking
- **Bulk Operations**: Efficiently process multiple tasks at once with flexible search criteria
- **Project Management**: Full CRUD for projects, sections, and collaborators
- **Subtask Support**: Hierarchical task management with parent-child relationships
- **Labels & Filters**: Organize with labels and create custom filters (Pro/Business)
- **Reminders**: Set absolute or relative reminders (Pro/Business)
- **Collaboration**: Task assignment and shared project workflows
- **Activity Tracking**: Audit trails and productivity statistics
- **Natural Language**: Quick add tasks using Todoist's natural language parsing

Perfect for productivity-focused workflows, this extension provides 19 specialized tools covering all aspects of task and project management.

tools.name: todoist_task
tools.description: Manage Todoist tasks - create, read, update, delete, complete, reopen, or quick add using natural language

tools.name: todoist_task_bulk

tools.name: todoist_subtask
tools.description: Manage subtasks - create, bulk create, convert tasks to subtasks, promote subtasks, or view hierarchy

tools.name: todoist_project
tools.description: Manage Todoist projects - create, read, update, delete, archive, or get collaborators

tools.name: todoist_project_ops
tools.description: Advanced project operations - reorder, move to parent, or get archived projects

tools.name: todoist_section
tools.description: Manage Todoist sections - create, read, update, delete, move, reorder, or archive

tools.name: todoist_label
tools.description: Manage Todoist labels - create, read, update, delete, or get usage statistics

tools.name: todoist_comment
tools.description: Manage comments on tasks and projects - create, read, update, or delete

tools.name: todoist_reminder
tools.description: Manage task reminders - create, read, update, or delete (Pro/Business plan required)

tools.name: todoist_filter
tools.description: Manage custom filters - create, read, update, or delete (Pro/Business plan required)

tools.name: todoist_collaboration
tools.description: Manage collaboration features - invitations, notifications, and workspace operations

tools.name: todoist_user
tools.description: Get user information - profile info, productivity stats, or karma history

tools.name: todoist_utility
tools.description: Utility operations - test connection, test features, test performance, find/merge duplicates

tools.name: todoist_task_ops
tools.description: Advanced task operations - move, reorder, or close tasks

tools.name: todoist_completed
tools.description: Retrieve completed tasks - get single, get all, or get statistics

tools.name: todoist_activity
tools.description: Access activity logs - get log, get events, or get summary

tools.name: todoist_backup
tools.description: Access automatic backups - list available backups or download

tools.name: todoist_notes
tools.description: Manage project notes - create, read, update, or delete (for collaborators)

tools.name: todoist_shared_labels
